column4: hey  ive lost my login manager button in system > preferences,  also ive lost  my shutdown and restart buttons   help!
By chance have you ever run automatix?  or envy.. both bad ideas by the way
From repos or from the web

Next go to system...pref..advanced desktop effects....  On the first page  put check next to rotate cube and desktop cube.. dbl click general options... up closer to the top...  click on desktop size  and set them to 4, 1 and 1  top to bottom
